reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Plugged right in
reviews.reviewText: A little too tight. Solid item

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect accessory for my 1999 Mercury Mountaineer OEM Speaker upgrade!
reviews.reviewText: Perfect accessory for my 1999 Mercury Mountaineer OEM Speaker upgrade!Needed to update the front, rear speakers in my Mountaineer. Wiring harness was a perfect fit, to the existing speaker adapter. Easy installation.- quality product!Recommended!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as described

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Crimp terminals on these adapter cables didn't fit on my Kicker spears very well soI had to cut and splice in the cables that came with the Kickers. Other end plugged right in to factory connector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits 2004 f150 Heritage
reviews.reviewText: Fit perfectly and would buy again. Fast shipping and exactly as shown in pictures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So I bought these connectors because I wanted to keep everything nice and neat and as close to factory as possible. I bought kicker speakers to replace my factory speakers and I could not get these ends to fit properly on the speakers eventually ended up cutting off the ends and putting the ones that came with the speakers on the plug part but save yourself some time because I wasted to much on a simple install that was supposed to be a plug and play ordeal

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes speaker install simple
reviews.reviewText: This was much better than using the connectors that came with the new speakers, it was simple to install connect to the new speakers and plug into the vehicle wiring harness and done. No missing with solders or mixed wires connection. I would recommend this product to anyone installing speakers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick Arrival & Sure Fit
reviews.reviewText: I installed an after market stereo and it did not come with these harness, but getting them through Amazon I received them the next day. They connected like hand and glove.
